bibl.title: Studies in Greek Elegy and Iambus.

series.title: Untersuchungen zur antiken Literatur und Geschichte. Band

bibl.seg: West Martin L., Studies in Greek Elegy and Iambus. (Untersuchungen zur antiken Literatur und Geschichte. Band 14.)
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1974, 8°, ix-198 pp.

C.R. par David A. Campbell, Phoenix 30 (1976) pp. 288-291. - Enzo Degani, Gnomon 52 (1980) pp. 512-516. - François Lasserre, AntCl 44 (1975) pp. 693-695. - Wolfgang Luppe, DLZ 96 (1975) coll. 689-692. - James V. Romano, CW 69 (1976) pp. 393-395. - W. J. Verdenius, Mnemosyne 4a s., 29 (1976) pp. 189-191.
